item.title: By: Thomas Rushton

item.description: 600 hours saved per year? That's one helluva return on investment - don't forget to put it into your appraisal!
item.content:encoded: 600 hours saved per year? That’s one helluva return on investment – don’t forget to put it into your appraisal!

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.content:encoded:
You can also use undocumented T-SQL, see here Read the error log with T-SQL

here are some commands

–Read current error log
EXEC xp_readerrorlog 0
GO

–Search for backup database messages

EXEC sp_readerrorlog 0, 1, ‘Database backed up’
GO
